# Name Email
{{ picture.id }} {{ picture.alt }}
{{ picture.content }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit { pictures: Picture[] = []; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService, private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.pictures = data; }); } fetchUrlContent(url: string, id: string) { this.http.get(url, { responseType: 'text' }).subscribe( data => { const picture = this.pictures.find(p => p.id === id); if (picture) { picture.content = data; } }, error => { console.error(error); } ); } }
